Sentencas: Nano-crystalline rare earth ions doped Cu/Cr nanoferrites, with the general formula CuCr0.3R0.03Fe1.67O4 where R = Sm, Nd, Ce, and La, were prepared by the standard ceramic method.
Titulo: Tuning the structural and magnetic properties on Cu/Cr nanoferrite using different rare-earth ions

Sentencas: The structure was studied by X-ray diffraction analysis (XRD), Atomic force microscopy and High-resolution transmission electron microscopy.
Titulo: Tuning the structural and magnetic properties on Cu/Cr nanoferrite using different rare-earth ions

Sentencas: XRD analysis confirmed that the samples had cubic spinel structures.
Titulo: Tuning the structural and magnetic properties on Cu/Cr nanoferrite using different rare-earth ions

Sentencas: The morphology indicated that the samples were in the nanoscale form.
Titulo: Tuning the structural and magnetic properties on Cu/Cr nanoferrite using different rare-earth ions

Sentencas: The magnetic properties were studied at room temperature (300 K) and at low temperature (100 K) using vibrating sample magnetometer.
Titulo: Tuning the structural and magnetic properties on Cu/Cr nanoferrite using different rare-earth ions

Sentencas: The saturation magnetization (M-s) at 100 K was nearly twice than that at 300 K. The most suitable sample in the present work to be applied in many technological applications (especially in solid-oxide fuel cell electrodes) is La sample due to it has the highest saturation magnetization (M-s) and low coercivity (H-c).
Titulo: Tuning the structural and magnetic properties on Cu/Cr nanoferrite using different rare-earth ions
